  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111969</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111969</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Tombola</string>
            <string language="en">Bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bingo-test</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Bingo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bingo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učni pripomoček je namenjen prepoznavanju in branju števil do 20. Učiteljica ali učenec vleče magnetne številke, jih bere in pritrjuje na tablo. Učenci si številko, če jo najdejo na svojem listu, prekrijejo z link kocko. Kdor ima 3 v vrsti, je zmagovalec. Trakove lahko plastificiraš.</string>
            <string language="en">Set of numbers from 1..20 that are arranged in table and can be used to create cards for playing bingo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tombola</string>
            <string language="en">bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">število</string>
            <string language="en">number</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">matematika</string>
            <string language="en">mathematics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Set Zahlen von 1..20, die in der Tabelle geordnet
werden und verwendet werden können, Karten für das Spielen von von 
Bingo herzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ensemble de nombres de 1..20 qui sont arrangés 
dans la table et peuvent être utilisés pour créer des cartes pour 
jouer le bingo-test.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo dos números de 1..20 que são arranjados na
tabela e podem ser usados criar cartões para jogar o bingo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme dei numeri da 1..20 che sono organizzati 
in tabella e possono essere usati creare le schedi per il gioco del 
bingo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο αριθμών από 1,,20 που τακτοποιούνται στον 
πίνακα και μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για να δημιουργήσουν τις 
κάρτες για το bingo παιχνιδιού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto de los números a partir del 1..20 que 
se arreglan en vector y se pueden utilizar crear las tarjetas para 
jugar bingo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bingo-test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nombre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mathématiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">número</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">matemática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">numero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">bingo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αριθμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
